categories: Category:Enlisted stormtroopers of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A stormtrooper of Joker Squad explored the ruins of the Ossus Jedi Academy with at least four other Jokers in 137 ABY. Along with Corporal Anson Trask, the stormtrooper discovered the Jedi Knight Shado Vao in the temple's sub-basement. Vao used a mind trick on them, however, and they reported a fruitless search to their superiors. Darth Stryfe ordered an orbital bombardment anyway.

Five stormtroopers in total are shown exploring the ruins in the seventeenth issue of Star Wars: Legacy. One issue previously, three are shown, with one of them going unnamed. It is possible that said unnamed trooper is the character described in this article.
